caption.p: Chiral gas chromatogram of the oleoresin essential oil of Protium amazonicum. 1, (+)-α-thujene; 2, (−)-α-thujene; 3, (+)-α-pinene; 4, (−)-α-pinene; 5, (+)-β-pinene; 6, (−)-β-pinene; 7, 3,7,7-trimethyl-1,3,5-cycloheptatriene; 8, 1,8-cineole; 9, (−)-δ-3-carene; 10, (−)-limonene; 11, (+)-limonene; 12, p-cymene; 13, α-terpinolene; 14, γ-terpinene; 15, m-cymenene; 16, p-cymenene; 17, camphor; 18, α-phellandren-8-ol; 19, (−)-α-terpineol; 20, eucarvone; 21, (+)-α-terpineol; 22, m-cymen-8-ol; 23, p-cymen-8-ol; 24, α- trans-bergamotene.
